actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to prohibit the furnishing of mailing lists and other lists of names or addresses by Government agencies to the public in connection with the use of the U. S. mails.

summary.text: Prohibits the furnishing of mailing lists and other lists of names or addresses by Government agencies to the public in connection with the use of the United States mails. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 511, 560)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the furnishing of mailing lists and other lists of names or addresses by Government agencies to the public in connection with the use of the U. S. mails.
